attributes.action: Save the spare ground from building
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a 2 acre area of swamp and woodland that is not like any other within the North Wales area. This will soon be drained and destroy the habitat for amphibians, reptiles, birds and mammals plus many types of insect. It will be a massive loss to the area

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
